responses: 1: Yes, but there are only special (not permanent) committees.
2: Yes, there are permanent committees, but they are not very significant in affecting the
3: Yes, there are permanent committees that have strong influence on the course of policymaking.
citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: Does the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature have a functioning committee system?
